params.target: Target contract to call (must be one of: staking, vesting or voting machine)

params.newHolder: the new holder (only can be called by governance)

params._percentages: array of token percentages locked at a date
params._timedeltas: array of date deltas from TGE when percentages are valid

approve(uint256).notice: approve a transfer to the staking machine.

callWithData(address,bytes).notice: Calls a function from target passing data

deposit(uint256).notice: deposit MOCs in the staking machine

verify().notice: Mark contract as verified by holder

withdrawAll().notice: Withdraws all available tokens to holder address
